gate.plugin.corpusstats

Class CorpusStatsCollocationsData

  • java.lang.Object
    • gate.plugin.corpusstats.CorpusStatsCollocationsData
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class CorpusStatsCollocationsData
extends Object
implements Serializable
    Class representing pairwise collocation statistics. Also has methods for saving and loading data using either a binary file or two TSV files.
    Author:
    Johann Petrak
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        public void initStats()
